00034     
00038     double GetAngleTo(const ArenaObject &other) const {
00039         return atan2(other.py-py, other.px-px);
00040     }
00044     double GetDistanceTo(const ArenaObject &other) const {
00045         const double dx = other.px-px, dy = other.py-py;
00046         return sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);
00047     }
00048
